4318180.name: Pathologic 3 Soundtrack
4318180.description:
Ice-Pick Lodge will continue to experiment with weird games. Want to support the studio? Purchasing this soundtrack will provide the developers with more caffeine to fuel their inspiration, and you'll get the game's soundtrack.

What’s inside?
  • Digital soundtrack – a digital version of the Pathologic 3 Original Soundtrack.

We want the people who buy this version of the game to know how grateful we are. But please note that this is exactly what it says on the tin: a way to support the studio. Thank you!
